Name: D-C Check 4.5.3.3
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.3.3 D-C Voltage-Amperage Check</size>

Panel 5		MN BUS TIE (2) 					- OFF (verify)
Panel 3		FC 1 & 2 MNA tb (2) 			- gray
			FC 3 MNA tb 					- bp
			FC 1 & 2 MNB tb 				- bp
			FC 3 MNB tb (2) 					- gray
			DC IND sel 						- FC 1, 2, 3
				DC AMPS ind 				- record amps
			DC IND sel 						- MNA, B
				DC VOLTS ind 				- 26.5-31 vdc (record)
			DC IND sel 						- BAT BUS A, B, & BAT C
				DC VOLTS ind 				- 31.5-38.0 vdc
				DC AMPS ind 				- <3.0 amps
Panel 101	SYS TEST (2) 					- 5B
				SYS TEST ind 				- 3.4-4.1 vdc
Panel 2		If LM PWR 						- CSM
				SYS TEST (2) 				- 7D
					SYS TEST ind 			- 0.5-3.2 vdc

			CAUTION
		Do not leave DC IND sel at PYRO BAT A (B) position any longer 
		than req to read DC VOLTS ind, or pyro bat chg will be depleted.

Panel 3		DC IND sel 						- PYRO BAT A, B
				DC VOLTS ind 				- 36.5-37.5 vdc
			DC IND sel 						- MNA
